name: Button
html: <input type='button' enabled='false' class='btn btn-default container_item' value='{{options[0].value}}'  sn-item='true' sn-item-click='onItemClick($id)' id='Button'>

name: Textbox
html: <input type='text' class='form-control' sn-item='true' sn-item-click='onItemClick($id)' id='Textbox' data-ng-value='options[0].value' >
